id: As Brexit Drags On, Investors Seek More Protection
paragraph:
November 18, 2018For U.K. investors, an uncertain future just got more uncertain—and many aren’t taking chances. This week’s stall in Brexit talks dashed any immediate hope of clarity over what Britain’s eventual deal with the European Union—if there is one at all—might look like. That left investors still looking for ways to protect themselves.Hedge funds...
